dt: {bc}a female fictional {d_link|hero|hero} having extraordinary or superhuman powers {bc}a female {d_link|superhero|superhero}

dt.t: Change may be around the corner, as Wonder Woman—arguably, the most recognized {wi}superheroine{/wi} of the modern age—finally arrived on the big screen.
… women are still waiting—on screen and off—for a place in the comic-book-branded, fanboy-dominated superhero cosmos. This is not to say that there are no {wi}superheroines{/wi}.

aq.auth: Manohla Dargis and A. O. Scott

dt: {bc}an exceptionally courageous, skillful, or successful woman or girl

dt.t: The band celebrates {wi}superheroines{/wi} … like themselves, who go where most women fear.
Rorke is a real-life {wi}superheroine{/wi} in her own way. In 2004 … she won the trade and industry department's Technology for Women in Business Award.

shortdef: a female fictional hero having extraordinary or superhuman powers : a female superhero; also : an exceptionally courageous, skillful, or successful woman or girl
